question: You want to arrange a conference for your company, and you need to ask one of your colleagues to give a presentation in this conference. Write a letter to your colleague. In your letter include:• Details about the conference• Why you want your colleague to give the presentation• What arrangement you will do for this conference
text: I am writing this letter to regard a conference which I am arranging for the company and I was wondering if you could present our organization in this meeting.

First of all, this seminar is going to be held on 3 May inside the premises of our office. The main concentration of this event is to demonstrate the new strategies in the marketing area. Besides this, you will have to give brief information about the upcoming products.

I would be appreciated it if you could prepare and give this slide presentation in front of new employees. I have recommended your name as you are an excellent representative as well as you have quite a good experience with new techniques regarding customer behaviour and trends.

Concerning the arrangements, I send you a leaflet which has been provided by our management about this occasion. Also, I will make all preparations regarding equipment such as a projector and sound system. If you have any queries you can call me without any hesitation.
I am looking forward to your contribution to this conference.
